metadata.name: Book Games Tool - Meta Card
metadata.description:
This Meta Card gives its owner early access to features in the book games tool: bookgamestool.eth. The art for each card was created by Karl Cross as he imagined bringing each book games strategy to life 

 The Hold strategy is for those with diamond hands and a good sense for high value tokens. The style of this minted card is a reminder that patience comes from understanding the value of what you have without regard for the noise (positive or negative).
